patthana15.2:1.1: Hetuṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana15.2:2.1: Nahetuṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana15.2:3.1: Hetuṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca nahetuṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana15.2:4.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.2:6.1: Hetuṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana15.2:8.1: Hetuṃ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
